articles.title: Fashion flops! Millie Mackintosh leads the BAFTAs worst dressed - Daily Mail
articles.description: Reality TV star Millie Mackintosh, director Charlotte Carroll and RuPaul's Drag Race star Bimini Bon Boulash were among those who missed the mark at the BAFTAs in London.
articles.content:
